entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
